title: LOGIN ISSUE: Unable to log into my main account
body:
Hi There,

I am currently having an issue logging into my main account. ( Summoner name: iBeyondGodly )  I was just on it not even a 4 hours ago. Went out for supper and came back to a red message after typing in the correct username and password stating " Username or password is incorrect. Please try logging in again. If you have forgotten your password. click here. "   

The weird thing is that I am able to log into my 2x smurf accounts with no issues whatsoever. 

So I am lead to believe that there could be an easy fix to this current problem which I am not doing properly or worst case someone has hacked my account and I must recover which I already submitted a ticket for.  
I also followed many of the Solution/Troubleshooting steps and none seemed to have worked so I'm just kind of mind boggled at this.

Please someone help me... i invested alot of my own personal money into this one account in support of this awesome game.

Thank you and sincerely, 

Julian aka ibeyondgodly.

replies.body:
If you're able to login to other accounts fine, and you know the password you're using was correct, I'd say there's a good chance someone compromised your account and changed the password without you realizing =\ . 

Hit up our account recovery team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) asap to make sure nobody else has access, and they should be able to repair any damage that hacker might have done!
Thank you for your quick reply.
